#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    for(int t = 1;;t++)
    {
            int n,m;
            scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
            if(n==0 && m==0)
                    break;
            char arr[n][m+1];
            for(int i = 0; i<n;i++)
                scanf("%s", &arr[i]);
            if(t != 1)
                 printf("\n");
            printf("Field #%d:\n",t);
            for(int i =0;i<n;i++)
            {
                    for(int j = 0;j<m;j++)
                    {
                            if(arr[i][j] == '*')
                                printf("*");
                            else
                            {
                                int cnt = 0;
                                if(i != 0)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i-1][j] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(i != n-1)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i+1][j] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(j != 0)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i][j-1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(j != m-1)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i][j+1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(i != 0 && j!=0)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i-1][j-1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(i != 0 && j!=m-1)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i-1][j+1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(i!=n-1 && j != 0)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i+1][j-1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                if(i!=n-1 && j != m-1)
                                {
                                     if(arr[i+1][j+1] == '*')
                                          cnt++;
                                }
                                
                                printf("%d",cnt);
                            }
                    }
                    printf("\n");
            }
    }
}
